title: Introduction to Dynamic Programming
content: Dynamic programming is both a mathematical optimization method and a computer programming method. The method was developed by Richard Bellman in the 1950s and has found applications in numerous fields, from aerospace engineering to economics. title: Find Minimum Path Sum in a given 2D Array.
content:
Given a m x n grid filled with non-negative numbers, find a path from top left to bottom right which minimizes the sum of all numbers along its path.
Note: You can only move either down or right at any point in time.

title: Find total ways to reach the nth stair using step 1, 2 or 3.
content:
